headline: LEYBOLD ROTARY VANE MECHANICAL VACUUM PUMP 36.7 CFM
description: Two Stage Mechanical Vacuum Pump          Once sold, all mechanical vacuum pumps will be rebuilt to factory specifications, unless stated otherwise. All rebuilt pumps are sold with a one year warranty on parts and labor. Pumps can be ordered Fomblin® or standard hydrocarbon oil prepped.   Pumping speed and ultimate pressure are based on 60 Hz operation.    Leybold D60A
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Leybold
Model D60A
Pumping Speed 36.7 CFM (1,037.0 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 3.00E-4(En) torr (4.00E-4 mbar)
Inlet Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Refurbished YES
Two-Stage YES
Gas Ballast Yes
Direct Drive Yes
Motor Horsepower 2 HP
Rotational Speed 1,200 RPM
Oil Capacity Maximum: 3.79 L (4.00 qt, 0.83 Br gal)
Power Requirements 208 V 6.9 A 60 Hz 3 Phase
Weight 210 lb (95 kg)
